articles.title: Google's updated AI-powered NotebookLM expands to India, UK and over 200 other countries - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google has expanded NotebookLM, an AI-powered note-taking assistant, to over 200 new countries and over 100 languages.
articles.content: Google on Thursday said it is rolling out NotebookLM, its AI-powered note-taking assistant, to over 200 new countries, nearly six months after opening its access in the U.S. The platform, powered by … [+3775 chars]

articles.author: Namita S Kalla
articles.title: Yoga for eyes: Best expert-approved exercises to improve eyesight, avoid eye muscle weakness - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Practising eye yoga daily may have a major positive impact on your eye health. Consistent practice of techniques such as side focus, front focus, palming, and others may lead to enhanced eye comfort and sharper vision clarity.
articles.content: Poor vision can reflect in various ways, affecting your daily life and well-being. Symptoms include blurred vision, difficulty focusing, eye strain, headaches, dry eyes, and increased sensitivity to … [+3396 chars]
